channel.title: Microscope - Fantasy
channel.description:
I will be running a session of Microscope this month for folks interested in building a fantasy world and exploring its history.
"In Microscope, you build an epic history as you play. Want to play a game that spans the entire Dune series, the Silmarillion, or the rise and fall of Rome in an afternoon? That’s Microscope."
The X-Card and Lines and Veils will be in used for safety tools as well as the Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy.
We will use Streamyard to play. I will record and post the session to youtube if all players consent.
February 9th 7:30 PM GMT +1: [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LyxuhuQx7cTk8lLvzHA](https://slack-redir.net/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com%2Fevent-detail%2F-LyxuhuQx7cTk8lLvzHA)
